reasoning_content: Need to modify code to use get_y_limits returning YLimits. Probably replace direct ax.get_ylim with plotter.get_y_limits(). Use its attributes. Provide updated snippet.
content:
y_limits = plotter.get_y_limits()
        new_height = (y_limits.top - y_limits.bottom) * zoom_factor
        half = new_height / 2
        middle = (y_limits.bottom + y_limits.top) / 2
        plotter.set_y_limits(middle - half, middle + half)
